name: Ninja Jump FREE
description:
Ninboy is a super hero bobblehead ninja, only he can't fly - he needs your help! Use your finger to draw his jumping and flying platforms so he can jump in the air and collect magical gems. If you don't help him, he fails and crashes into the cold, heartless ocean. Power boosts help him to zoom through the air at warp speed. But watch out for evil Spike Bobbles which are determined to stop him!

Play against your friends and unlock achievements to become the Ninboy Jump Hero!

Are you ready to help Ninboy?
